title: So why are you leaving ranked games up RIOT?
body: So i wake up, see that there are some minor issues with a  small few disconnecting. Im like oh...thats normal.  Join a game...insta cant connect to the server period. Ever. Lose LP.  Now curious...why when its clear as day you are having severe issues with the ranked connectivity that you would leave RANKED games up for people to crash repeatedly in? o.O

replies.body:
When we realized we were having problems with our server connections, we did disable ranked games. While we weren't able to catch onto the issue as quickly as we would have liked to, rest easy that we are working to fix any impact this may have had for our players. 

The issue should be resolved at this point, but you can stay up to date at our post [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues).

If Riot were running an airport this morning

*plane slams into the ground from a downdraft*

Huh

*second plane crashes*

*mumbling* "should we cancel departures?" "Nah, let's not be hasty"

We are aware of a problem causing planes to stall and crash, we are investigating the issue, no flights are cancelled at this time.

I came to ask the exact same question you did. I thought the problem was small but  two ranked games in a row with multiple people gone on both teams and the boards turning into a shit storm makes me think it's fairly widespread and that they'll be forced to do something soon. At least I hope they will.

def not. i assumed it was a select few since they left RANKED games up and available to play.  Check the forums and see thousands...its like wow riot...way to drop the ball jesus.  Thats the kinda crap a game like HELLGATE london would pull.

I only assumed it was happening to some people. But yippee everyone but one person on my team can connect. but I get leaver and minus 17lp points, while i was trying to reconnect the entire time. =\ like really.  I shouldn't have qued and just not leagued today. >_<
